hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e -v
umask 0022 export PATH=$PATH:/opt/infer-dev/infer.git/infer/bin/ echo "Cleanup previous build" rm -rf rm -rf obj-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu reports/ /tmp/scan-build-*
echo "Cleanup" ./mach clobber
cat > .mozconfig <<EOF ac_add_options --enable-debug --verbose # --disable-unified-compilation
mk_add_options MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS="-j20" EOF
echo "Apply patches on top of the hg repo" hg qpop -a hg qpush -a
echo "Build using infer" infer --project_root /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/firefox-infer/ -o firefox-infer/ -x firefox -r ${MERCURIAL_REVISION_SHORT} -- make clean all chmod o+rx $(find firefox-infer/ -type d) chmod -R o+r firefox-infer rsync -arv -R firefox-infer/ sledru@people.mozilla.org:/home/sledru/public_html/reports/
